qas.question: What musical styles did post-punk help merge?
What beginnings rose from the dead ashes of post-punk?
New wave, industrial music, synthpop and house all share roots in what genre?
What style of music did post-punk band the Cure play in?
What genre of music did Joy Division help in the development of?
Which type of eclectic music had a huge variety, large innovations and an "anything goes" mentality?
Which darker post-punk bands gave rise to gothic rock?

answers.text: Joy Division, Siouxsie and the Banshees, Bauhaus and the Cure

qas.question: Where did systhpop, industrial and neo-psychedelia music derive from?
What type of music was gothic rock?
What styles of music did post-punk pave the way for?

answers.text: new wave, dance-rock, New Pop, industrial music, synthpop, post-hardcore, neo-psychedelia alternative rock and house music

qas.question: What musical genre had limited variety of musical innovations?

plausible_answers.text: new wave, dance-rock, New Pop, industrial music, synthpop, post-hardcore, neo-psychedelia alternative rock and house music

qas.question: Which genres were least influenced by post-punk?

plausible_answers.text: Joy Division, Siouxsie and the Banshees, Bauhaus and the Cure

qas.question: Which bands had a lighter style of music?
What kinds of rock genre were not influenced by post-punk?

context: <a5_0><a7_0><b10_0><b11_0>Post-punk<b11_0/><b10_0/><a7_0/><a5_0/> was an eclectic genre which resulted in a wide variety of musical innovations and helped merge <a0_0>white and black musical styles<a0_0/>. Out of the <a2_0>post-punk<a2_0/> milieu came the beginnings of <a1_0>various subsequent genres<a1_0/>, including <a9_0><b12_0>new wave, dance-rock, New Pop, industrial music, synthpop, post-hardcore, neo-psychedelia alternative rock and house music<b12_0/><a9_0/>. Bands such as <a6_0><b13_0>Joy Division, Siouxsie and the Banshees, Bauhaus and the Cure<b13_0/><a6_0/> played in a <a3_0><a8_0>darker, more morose<a3_0/> style<a8_0/> of post-punk that lead to the development of the <a4_0><b14_0>gothic<b14_0/> rock<a4_0/> genre.
